participant_1.background:
I would like to be reincarnated as a dog so I can continue to be with my family.
i enjoy hiking.
My family is very supportive of my dream to be an actor.
I'm taking my dog to the park in my dapper new suit.
i like toyota cars.

participant_2.background:
I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
i write fiction for fun.
my favorite movie is pretty woman.
i like to write my own songs.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite thing about your life right now?
Hi! My favorite thing is creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
That's so nice of you! I love pretty wedding cakes. Do you have any pictures?
Yes! I can send you some. What's your favorite movie?
Pretty Woman is my favorite movie! Did you know it's based on a true story?
No, I didn't know that! That's really interesting. I love the soundtrack to that movie.
Me too! I've seen that movie so many times, I can sing along to most of the songs.
I'm impressed! I'm not very good at singing, but I like to write my own songs.
That's cool! I've always wanted to write a song, but I'm not very good at it.
You should give it a try! It's really fun.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
